TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OracleConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OracleConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 为创建和管理由 类使用的连接字符串的内容提供了一种简单方法。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型已弃用，并将在 .NET Framework 的未来版本中删除。This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Oracle 和 ADO.NET](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet). 连接字符串生成器允许开发人员以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串，并使用类的属性和方法来分析和重新生成现有的连接字符串。The connection string builders allow developers to programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and to parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 连接字符串生成器提供了与 Oracle 允许的已知键/值对相对应的强类型属性。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by Oracle. 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 这意味着该类在设计时适用于 Visual Studio .NET 设计器。This means that the class works with Visual Studio .NET designers at design time. 当开发人员使用设计器在 Visual Studio .NET 中生成强类型化 **数据集** 和强类型连接时，强类型连接字符串生成器类将显示与其类型关联的属性，并且还将具有可映射已知密钥的公共值的转换器。When developers use the designer to build strongly typed **DataSets** and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio .NET, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys. 需要在应用程序中创建连接字符串的开发人员可以使用 类生成和修改连接字符串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 类还可以轻松管理存储在应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 对键/值对的有效性进行检查。The performs checks for valid key/value pairs. 因此，此类不能用于创建无效的连接字符串。Therefore, this class cannot be used to create invalid connection strings. 尝试添加无效对会引发异常。Trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception. 类维护一个固定的同义词集合，并在需要时执行所需的转换，以将同义词转换为相应的已知键名。The class maintains a fixed collection of synonyms, and when required, can perform the required translation to convert from a synonym to the corresponding well-known key name. 例如，使用 属性检索值时，可以指定一个字符串，该字符串包含所需的键的任何同义词。For example, when you use the property to retrieve a value, you can specify a string that contains any synonym for the key you need. 有关可接受同义词的完整列表，请参见 属性。See the property for a full list of acceptable synonyms. 句柄尝试插入恶意条目。The handles attempts to insert malicious entries. 例如，下面的代码使用 索引器 (的默认属性（在 c # 中） ) 正确地转义嵌套的键/值对。For example, the following code, using the default property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair. ```vb Dim builder As New System.Data. _ OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "OracleDemo" builder("Integrated Security") = True builder("User ID") = "Mary;NewValue=Bad" System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` ```csharp System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "OracleDemo"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["User ID"] = "Mary;NewValue=Bad"; System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` 结果是以下连接字符串，通过将用户 ID 值括在引号中，以安全的方式处理无效值：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner by enclosing the User ID value in quotes: ``` Data Source=OracleDemo;Integrated Security=True;User ID="Mary;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序将生成 Oracle 数据库的连接字符串。The following console application builds connection strings for an Oracle database. 此代码使用 类创建连接字符串，然后将 该实例的属性传递 给 connection 类的构造函数。The code uses an class to create the connection string, and then passes the property of the instance to the constructor of the connection class. 该示例还分析了现有的连接字符串，并演示了操作连接字符串内容的各种方式。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 所提供的连接字符串为实例的内部连接信息提供数据。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供键/值对的固定内部集合。The class provides a fixed internal collection of key/value pairs. 即使您只提供构造函数中可能的连接字符串值的一个小子集，该对象也会始终提供每个键/值对的默认值。Even if you supply only a small subset of the possible connection string values in the constructor, the object always provides default values for each key/value pair. 检索对象的属性时，字符串只包含值与项的默认值不同的键/值对。When the property of the object is retrieved, the string contains only key/value pairs in which the value is different from the default value for the item. ## Examples 下面的示例在对象的构造函数中提供了一个简单的连接字符串 ，然后循环访问该对象中的所有键/值对。The following example supplies a simple connection string in the object's constructor, and then iterates through all the key/value pairs within the object. 请注意，集合提供每个项的默认值。Note that the collection provides default values for each items. 另请注意， 类会转换已知键的同义词，使其与已知名称一致。Also note that the class converts synonyms for the well-known keys so that they are consistent with the well-known names. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 连接字符串中包含无效的键名。

span.span: Invalid key name within the connection string.

exception.span: 连接字符串中包含无效的值（具体而言，需要使用布尔值或数值，但字符串中并未提供）。

span.span: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, when a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).

summary.span: 清除 实例的内容。

span.span: Clears the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除 中的所有键/值对，并重置所有对应的属性。The method removes all key/value pairs from the , and resets all corresponding properties. 这包括将连接字符串重置为空字符串。This includes resetting the connection string to an empty string. ## Examples 下面的示例演示调用方法的效果 。The following example demonstrates the effect of calling the method. 此示例用一些键/值对填充 ，然后调用 方法并显示结果。This example populates the with some key/value pairs, and then calls the method and shows the results. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 包含固定大小的键/值对集合，因此 方法只确定特定键名是否有效。Because the contains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, the method determines only if a particular key name is valid. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 实例，并设置其一些属性，然后尝试通过调用方法来确定对象中是否存在不同的键 。The following example creates an instance, sets some of its properties, and then tries to determine whether various keys exist within the object by calling the method. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要连接到的 Oracle 数据源的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the Oracle data source to connect to.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于连接字符串中的 "数据源" 和 "服务器" 键。This property corresponds to the "Data Source" and "Server" keys within the connection string. 无论在提供的连接字符串中提供了哪些值，由创建的连接字符串 将使用众所周知的 "数据源" 键。Regardless of which of these values has been supplied within the supplied connection string, the connection string created by the will use the well-known "Data Source" key. 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果尚未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索属性，则返回值为 。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 类将 "数据源" 连接字符串密钥的同义词转换为众所周知的键。The following example demonstrates that the class converts synonyms for the "Data Source" connection string key into the well-known key. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与连接字符串内的“Enlist”键相对应。This property corresponds to the "Enlist" key within the connection string.

public: property bool IntegratedSecurity { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IntegratedSecurity : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示连接中是否指定了“User ID”和“Password”（当为 时），或者是否使用当前的 Windows 帐户凭据进行身份验证（当为 时）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether "User ID" and "Password" are specified in the connection (when ) or whether the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication (when ).

value.span: 属性的值；如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or a if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与连接字符串中的 "集成安全性" 键相对应。This property corresponds to the "Integrated Security" key within the connection string. ## Examples 以下示例将现有连接字符串从使用 Windows 身份验证转换为使用集成安全性。The following example converts an existing connection string from using Windows Authentication to using integrated security. 该示例通过以下方式来完成此工作：从连接字符串中移除用户名和密码，然后设置 对象的 属性。The example works by removing the user name and password from the connection string, and then setting the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 包含固定大小的字典，因此如果尝试添加的键不在字典中，则会引发 。Because the contains a fixed-size dictionary, trying to add a key that does not exist within the dictionary throws a . 下表列出了连接字符串中的所有可能的密钥，以及每个密钥的默认值。The following table lists all the possible keys within the connection string, and the default value for each. |键Key|propertiesProperty|默认值Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------------| |数据源 (或服务器) Data Source (or server)||空字符串Empty string| |持久性安全信息 (或 persistsecurityinfo) Persist Security Info (or persistsecurityinfo)||错误False| |集成安全性Integrated Security||错误False| |用户 ID (或用户或 uid) User ID (or user or uid)||空字符串Empty string| |密码Password||空字符串Empty string| |EnlistEnlist||TrueTrue| |PoolingPooling||TrueTrue| |Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size||00| |Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size||100100| |省略 Oracle 连接名称Omit Oracle Connection Name||错误False| |UnicodeUnicode||错误False| |负载均衡超时 (或连接生存期) Load Balance Timeout (or connection lifetime)||00| ## Examples 以下代码在控制台应用程序中新建一个 ，并使用 属性将键/值对添加到其连接字符串中。The following code, in a console application, creates a new and adds key/value pairs to its connection string, using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与连接字符串内的“Password”和“pwd”键相对应。This property corresponds to the "Password" and "pwd" keys within the connection string. ## Examples 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果尚未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索属性，则返回值为 。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is .

span.span: Building Connection Strings

member this.PersistSecurityInfo : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示如果连接是打开的或者一直处于打开状态，那么安全敏感信息（如密码）是否将不作为连接的一部分返回。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if security-sensitive information, such as the password, is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与连接字符串内的“Persist Security Info”和“persistsecurityinfo”键相对应。This property corresponds to the "Persist Security Info" and "persistsecurityinfo" keys within the connection string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Pooling { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示连接是否加入池中，或者在每次请求连接时，每个连接是否被显式打开。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the connection will be pooled, or whether each connection will be explicitly opened every time that the connection is requested.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Remove(string keyword) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Remove (keyword As String) As Boolean

param.name: keyword
param.span: 要从此 中的连接字符串移除的键/值对中的键。

span.span: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this .

summary.span: 从 实例中移除具有指定的键的项。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the instance.

returns.span: 如果该键原本存在于连接字符串中但被移除，则为 ；如果连接字符串中不存在该键，则为 。

span.span: if the key existed within the connection string and was removed, if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 方法返回一个指示其成功的值，因此在尝试从实例中移除键/值对之前，不需要查找键是否存在 。Because the method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not necessary to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the instance. 由于 维护固定大小的键/值对集合，因此调用 方法只是将键/值对的值重置回其默认值。Because the maintains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, calling the method just resets the value of the key/value pair back to its default value. 由于 所支持的键集合是固定的，因此该集合中的每一项都具有已知的默认值。Because the collection of keys supported by the is fixed, every item within the collection has a known default value. 下表列出了每个键，以及 首次初始化时或调用方法之后的每个项的值 ：The following table lists the keys, and the value for each when the is first initialized, or after the method has been called: |键Key|默认值Default value| |---------|-------------------| |数据源Data Source|空字符串Empty string| |持久性安全信息Persist Security Info|错误False| |集成安全性Integrated Security|错误False| |用户 IDUser ID|空字符串Empty string| |密码Password|空字符串Empty string| |EnlistEnlist|TrueTrue| |PoolingPooling|TrueTrue| |Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size|00| |Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size|100100| |UnicodeUnicode|错误False| |Load Balance TimeoutLoad Balance Timeout|00| |省略 Oracle 连接名称Omit Oracle Connection Name|错误False| ## Examples 以下示例将现有连接字符串从使用 Windows 身份验证转换为使用集成安全性。The following example converts an existing connection string from using Windows Authentication to using integrated security. 该示例通过以下方式来完成此工作：从连接字符串中移除用户名和密码，然后设置 对象的 属性。The example works by removing the user name and password from the connection string, and then setting the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: is null ( in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool TryGetValue(string keyword, [out] object& value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function TryGetValue (keyword As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

span.span: The key of the item to retrieve.
The value corresponding to .

summary.span: 从此 中检索与提供的键相对应的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .

returns.span: 如果在连接字符串中找到 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许开发人员安全地从中检索值， 而无需验证提供的键名是否为有效的键名。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from an without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. 由于 正确地处理了不存在的键的搜索，因此在检索其值之前无需查找密钥的存在。Because gracefully handles searching for a non-existent key, there is no need to look for the existence of a key before retrieving its value. 使用不存在的键调用会将值 null (`Nothing`) 参数的 Visual Basic 中 `value` 。Calling with a nonexistent key will place the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的行为 。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个包含 中的值的 。

An that contains the values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值的顺序未指定，但与 属性返回的 中的关联键顺序相同。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the property. 因为每个 实例始终包含相同的固定键集合，所以 属性始终返回与固定键集合相对应的值，顺序与键相同。Because each instance of the always contains the same fixed set of keys, the property always returns the values corresponding to the fixed set of keys, in the same order as the keys. ## Examples 以下示例首先新建一个 ，然后循环访问该对象内的所有值。The following example first creates a new , and then iterates through all the values within the object.
